mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MA.attempts, -1) AS ATTEMPTS , M.MEMBER_ID AS ID , M.USERNAME AS USERNAME FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN MEMBERATTEMPTS MA ON M.MEMBER_ID = MA.MEMBER_ID WHERE M.USERNAME = #{userName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERATTEMPTS (MEMBER_ID, ATTEMPTS, LASTMODIFIED) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{attempts}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERATTEMPTS SET ATTEMPTS = ATTEMPTS + 1 , LASTMODIFIED = NOW() WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
UPDATE MEMBERATTEMPTS SET ATTEMPTS = 0 , LASTMODIFIED = NOW() WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND ATTEMPTS > 0
